Typealiases.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay16Clien.name: ClientCompletion
Typealiases.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay16Clien.abstract: Generic type associated with API completion/closures. Generic type O is the expected output result in a success case.

Typealiases.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay0A31Sub.name: SudoSubscriptionStatusChangeHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay0A31Sub.abstract: Generic type associated with Subscription Status change completion/closures.

Structs/ListOutput.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay.name: items
Structs/ListOutput.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay.abstract: Items returned by a List query output.

Structs/ListOutput.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay.name: nextToken
Structs/ListOutput.html#/s:11SudoDIRelay.abstract: Next token to call next page of paginated results.

Structs/ListOutput.html.name: ListOutput
Structs/ListOutput.html.abstract: Generic Type to wrap around an Output SudoDiRelay type from a List result.

Structs/Message.html.name: Message
Structs/Message.html.abstract: A message retrieved from the Relay Service

Structs/Postbox.html.name: Postbox
Structs/Postbox.html.abstract: A postbox that stores messages in the relay.

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: listPostboxes(limit:nextToken:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Get a list of postboxes associated with the current user, ordered from oldest to newest.

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: listMessages(limit:nextToken:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Get all messages from all postboxes associated with the current user, ordered from oldest to newest.

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: createPostbox(withConnectionId:ownershipProofToken:isEnabled:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Creates a Postbox associated with the given connection identifier.

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: updatePostbox(withPostboxId:isEnabled:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Updates the Postbox associated with the given identifier.

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: deletePostbox(withPostboxId:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Deletes the postbox associated with the given postbox identifier, including all messages stored inside that postbox.

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: deleteMessage(withMessageId:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Deletes the message associated with the given message identifier

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.name: subscribeToMessageCreated(statusChangeHandler:resultHandler:)
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html#/s:11Su.abstract: Subscribe to message creation events for the current user. Subscription events will be delivered as long as the

Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html.name: SudoDIRelayClient
Protocols/SudoDIRelayClient.html.abstract: Client used to interface with the Sudo Relay Platform service.

Protocols/SubscriptionToken.html.name: SubscriptionToken
Protocols/SubscriptionToken.html.abstract: Represents a subscription. When this object is released, the subscription is cancelled.

Enums/SudoDIRelayError.html#/s:11SudoDIR.name: relayServiceConfigNotFound
Enums/SudoDIRelayError.html#/s:11SudoDIR.abstract: The configuration related to Relay Service is not found in the provided configuration file

Enums/SudoDIRelayError.html#/s:11SudoDIR.name: fatalError(description:)
Enums/SudoDIRelayError.html#/s:11SudoDIR.abstract: Indicates that a fatal error occurred. This could be due to coding error, out-of-memory condition or other

Classes/DefaultSudoDIRelayClient.html#/s.abstract: Initialize an instance of DefaultSudoDIRelayClient. It uses configuration parameters defined in

Classes/DefaultSudoDIRelayClient.html.name: DefaultSudoDIRelayClient
Classes/DefaultSudoDIRelayClient.html.abstract: Default Client API Endpoint for interacting with the Relay Service.
